entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 10 except minus 16 in low lying inland areas.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 except calm in low lying inland areas overnight. Low minus 10 except minus 16 in low lying inland areas. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 06 February 2023
